snippet: The state should adopt a constitutional amendment that would provide relief for low-wage workers.
abstract: Editorial urges New Jersey voters to adopt a constitutional amendment that raises the minimum wage to $8.25 an hour starting on Jan 1; notes if amendment is approved, more than 400,000 people now working at or near minimum wage could benefit.
lead_paragraph: The state should adopt a constitutional amendment that would provide relief for low-wage workers.

headline.main: Add a Dollar an Hour in New Jersey
headline.print_headline: Add a Dollar an Hour in New Jersey
